title: Will I decay before season end?
body:
Hey guys,

On October 10th or 11th, I achieved Platinum 5. Schoolwork has built up a lot now so I decided to end the season at that and carry on next season. If I achieved Plat around those dates, will I decay to Gold 1 before end of season if I haven't played ranked since then?

If yes, and I were to play one and lose, will I demote? (I haven't yet played any in Plat 5, still at 0 LP)

Op.gg says I need to play more to have an accurate MMR, so that worried me a bit..

Thank you!

replies.body: You'll have 28 days from last ranked match in Platinum until you start decaying.  Our[ ranked play FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ) offers more info, but you should also have a game shield after a recent promotion so it might not be worth risking a decay.
